In the beginning, the paraverse swarmed: In the beginning, the paraverse swarmed with formless life and chaotic energy. Travellers were lost and confused, enticed by myriad opportunities, but unable to reach their destinations. A team of heroic guardians forged the Talisman to help guide their journeys.
Created from exotic nanoparticles, and a: Created from exotic nanoparticles, and able to safely store the deepest secrets, <2>Talisman</2> is here to help you start your paraverse journey.
For help and support please visit our Di: For help and support please visit our Discord

We'd like to gather <2>anonymous usage d: We'd like to gather <2>anonymous usage data</2> to help improve the experience of using Talisman.
If you opt-in, we will track minimal dat: If you opt-in, we will track minimal data and treat it with the respect it deserves. By accepting, you acknowledge you have read and agree to our updated <2>Privacy Policy</2>
We want to build simple tools that empow: We want to build simple tools that empower our users and allow them navigate web3 applications with ease. To help improve our product and features we'd like to collect anonymous usage information. This is optional, and you can opt-out at any time.

Your recovery phrase is used to restore: Your recovery phrase is used to restore your Talisman accounts if you forget your password or lose access to your device.
